Rapid_City.O'Harra Stadium: Dunham Field at O'Harra Memorial Stadium is a multi-purpose stadium located on the campus of the South Dakota School of Mines & Technology (SDSM&T) in Rapid City, South Dakota. It is the home of the South Dakota Mines Hardrockers football team, as well as Rapid City's two public high schools (Central and Stevens). The stadium is named after SDSM&T's eighth president, Dr.
